City Council

The City Council meets on the 2nd and 4th Monday of the month, excluding holidays and special circumstances. Agendas are posted at least 72 hours before the scheduled meeting at the City Hall Municipal Complex and on the City website. Minutes are posted, once approved by the City Council, after the subsequent council meeting.

Meetings can be viewed live on Charter Spectrum Cable Channel 190. They may also be live-streamed. Meetings are also uploaded to our Vimeo page for viewing at any time. For concise, easy-to-read summaries of recent City Council meetings, click City Council Meeting Summaries.

If you have any questions, please contact the City Secretary's Office at 817-222-7749.

City Council Contact Form

Meetings

  • 7:00 p.m. (Work Sessions start at 6:00 p.m.)
  • 2nd and 4th Monday of every month
  • Council Chambers (City Hall - 4801 Haltom Rd. | Haltom City, TX. 76117)

  • Place 6 - Dana Coffman
  • Place 7 - Don Cooper
  • City Council Meeting Summaries

Agendas & Minutes

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.
